resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my_locations",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "pin": {
                "properties": {
                    "location": {
                        "type": "geo_point"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my_locations",
    id="1",
    document={
        "pin": {
            "location": {
                "lat": 40.12,
                "lon": -71.34
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)
